meanings: Adjective 못마땅함 자만심이 강한, 허영심이 많은 (→vanity), (=conceited)
Noun 정맥 (→artery, deep vein thrombosis, varicose vein)

vlive.korean: 이건 진짜 눈 뜨고 코 베인 거잖아요! I am tricked! 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 웹드라마 [기적 소녀 5화] 공기놀이로 우리를 이겨봐
알겠습니다. - 혹시 '다크 나이트'에 나오는 베인? I see. - Are you Bane from "The Dark Night Rises"? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] A.C.E's SUMMER VACATION WEEK - 에이스 X 여름방학 스페셜위크
vlive.english: I see. - Are you Bane from "The Dark Night Rises"?

vlive.korean: 저는 TV 보면서 푸싱 하다가 손이 어긋나서 푸셔 날에 베인 적이 있어요. I've cut myself with a pusher while watching TV and doing this. 듣기 View video K Beauty-TIP : 큐티클제거 셀프네일케어 하는 법, 집에서 손톱정리 [Self Nail Care Routine]
vlive.english: I've cut myself with a pusher while watching TV and doing this.

vlive.korean: 아니야 살짝 베인 거라 괜찮아. No, it's just a slight cut. 듣기 View video 웹드라마 더블루씨(the BlueSea) : 더블루씨(the Blue Sea) 3화 - 심쿵
vlive.english: No, it's just a slight cut.

vlive.korean: 저는 제 땀 냄새가 베인 좋은 것들을 드립니다. I only give my own things. 듣기 View video BRANDNEW MUSIC : 키겐의 밤에 듣기 좋은 음감회
vlive.english: I only give my own things.

examples.korean: The cut healed up without leaving a scar. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 베인 상처는 흉터 없이 나았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cut healed up without leaving a scar. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was spitting blood from a badly cut lip. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 심하게 베인 입술에서 나오는 피를 뱉어 내고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was spitting blood from a badly cut lip. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He dabbed at the cut with his handkerchief. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 손수건으로 베인 데를 꼭꼭 눌렀다[눌러 닦았다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He dabbed at the cut with his handkerchief. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cut was bandaged to stem the bleeding. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 베인 상처에는 피가 흐르는 것을 막으려고 붕대가 감겨져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cut was bandaged to stem the bleeding. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a deep cut / wound 듣기 Add to Wordbook 깊게 베인 상처/깊은 상처 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
